idea:
Verraton Health has developed an Electronic Medical Repository (EMR) aligned to the Ayushman Bharat Digital Mission (ABDM) an initiative of the Government of India under the National Health Authority of India, The EMR solution is approved and certified by NHA with M1, M2 and M3 levels of integration.


Consult Verraton LLP is our development Partner.
name: VERRATON HEALTH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
G'Day, we are FitnessForce. We make leading software solutions for health and fitness centers in India, Middle East, SEA and now AUS/NZ with over 1000+ of customers. We're serious about fitness, member engagement, payment solutions and helping run an operationally efficient fitness business.
Our customers range from chains like Anytime Fitness(India/Vietnam), FitnessTime (KSA), Gold's Gym (KSA) to single premium clubs like Reset Gym, MMA Matrix etc.
name: FitnessForce

idea:
Peco Website


Born with a purpose to empower the beauty and grooming sector to expand digitally at no-extra costs.


Peco enables clients to easily book their prefered salon & services online and empowers you to manage your bookings instantly with our Salon Management™ Software !


With Peco, you can let your customers know more about your beauty and grooming services; whether at home or in salon. Keep your customers informed about the safety standards you follow.


Peco helps you grow by sharing your latest attractive offers with our custom client base. As a Peco partner, you have access to all this and many more exciting features with our proprietary Salon Management™ Software.


Peco helps you take your business to the next level with easy automation of appointment calendars for your entire team. And that’s not all! Our machine learning software provides you with customer and market analysis for better business planning in the future.
name: PECO SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We at KAMAKHYAEXIMS MINERALS & PETROCHEMICALS INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED Door delivery of diesel through Tech platform that aggregates customers through IOT enables app platform ,which eliminates, Financial loss due to pilferage, Dead Mileage due to adulterated diesel, Man-hour loss, Monetary loss due to Spillage &Loss of natural resource
name: KAMAKHYAEXIMS MINERALS & PETROCHEMICALS INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED
